title: github上传文件
author: gooding300
txt_content: 如何上传文件？我连新建文件夹都不会8

replies.author: aa210063654
replies.txt_content:
git init
git add "somefile"
git add README
git commit -m 'version'
git clone git://github.com/***/***.git "dirname"

附加:如果你不会玩git,用什么Github....老老实实的去用svn
而且,我看你根本用不着github

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content:
